name: Deepl translate
description:
Translate texts in Figma width DeepL's engine


Why

  • Create robust UI that won't break in different languages like Russian
  • Translate designs for multilingual user testing
  • Localise assets for AppStore, Google Play etc.


Features

  • Translates entire page or selection
  • Auto-detects source language
  • Translates to one of the 26 languages
  • Handles text styles


Languages

DeepL supports Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, German, Greek, English, Spanish, Estonian, Finnish, French, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Lithuanian, Latvian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, Swedish, Chinese


How to use

Plugin uses DeepL API key. To get started, get a free api key here


Thanks to Arneo for SRP design
